    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
    Represents the 10x10 game board composed of individual Cell objects.
    Cell
    Represents a single cell on the 10x10 game board.
    Destructor
    Represents a Destroyer ship (2 cells in length).
    EnemyController
    Controller class responsible for initializing and managing the enemy board.
    EnemyStage
    Custom JavaFX Stage that loads and displays the enemy board view.
    Fragata
    Represents a Fragata ship (1 cell in length).
    GameController
    Main game controller class that handles the naval battle game logic and UI interactions.
    GameStage
    Custom JavaFX Stage that displays the main game board.
    INavigable
    Defines navigation behavior for controllers within the application.
    InstructionsController
    Controller class for the instructions view.
    InstructionsStage
    Custom JavaFX Stage that displays the instructions screen to the player.
    Main
    Entry point for the Warship Dominions game.
    NavigationAdapter
    Abstract base class for controllers that require navigation between views.
    PlacementException
    Custom exception thrown when a ship cannot be placed on the board after several failed attempts.
    Portaviones
    Represents a Portaviones ship (4 cells in length).
    SavedShip
    Plain-old data transfer object (DTO) that stores the necessary data to reconstruct a ship on the enemy board during game load.
    Ship
    Represents a ship placed on the player's board.
    Ship
    Abstract base class representing a generic ship in the game.
    StartController
    Controller for the main start menu of the game.
    StartStage
    Custom JavaFX Stage that displays the main start screen of the game.
    Submarino
    Represents the Submarino ship type, which occupies 3 cells on the board.
